TopicTitle: testing topic (can I post unmoderated yet???)

Articles.Content:
To moderators: I'm just trying to test, but I can't test if I can't see my own posts. I also can't delete my tests, if I can't see them.

I understand the need to moderate posts, but please let ME see my OWN posts while they are being moderated!

I'm about to become a new forum user, so I'm simply TESTING 1st.
